title: Police: 3-year-old child shot by sibling
content:
Police spokesman Sgt. Thomas Decanter said they received information that a child was shot in the hand.
"A weapon was left out and the 3-year-old's brother got it and it accidentally went off and shot the 3-year-old in the hand," he said.
A woman who was leaving the daycare after picking up her child said she didn't know anything about a shooting. A woman who answered the door at the daycare had no comment.
